eventSummary: A team warned that scammers or regimes could have exploited a flaw, noting key-reuse patterns suggesting unauthorized clients, and called it the largest documented phone number exposure, though they deleted all collected data.Sources: - https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3m5xpar5umq2s

eventSummary: An actor exploited a third-party server of a municipality to steal and leak internal documents and access citizen police records. No confidential or proprietary data was downloaded, copied, or redistributed, and sensitive details were redacted from screenshots.Sources: - https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3m5xm74ynkb2h - https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3m5xm7bh3dl2f
